name: Watch Out Danger Ahead
description:
Watch Out Danger Ahead (WODA) was our first game ever, long before ShuddaHaddaLottaFun became our deal. It was released for iOS in 2011. In 2013, we did a remake of the game in Unity, creating a vertical slice prototype for the Midwest Game Developers Conference. This is that prototype.

Note* The Unity project for this game is all sorts of messed up due to many upgraded versions of many things. Therefore, the only platform we can find a build of for this game is the Mac build. Basically we are uploading it here for posterity sake. Also, the X button is Jump... not Space like the GIF says.
